title: How to Do the Infinite Launcher Glitch in Resident Evil 4

steps.headline: Second,Load a game that has already been beaten because the only way to get the infinite launcher is to beat the game.
Now buy the infinite launcher or if you already have it then start the game.
Pull out the knife and aim it at an enemy.
LET HIM HIT YOU!
steps.description: It's weird but it's the only way the glitch works.

steps.headline: Now Leon should look like he is impaled with an infinite launcher.

text: First turn on the game.  Second,Load a game that has already been beaten because the only way to get the infinite launcher is to beat the game.  Then you will need 1,000,000 currency. The infinite launcher costs 1,000,000. Now buy the infinite launcher or if you already have it then start the game.  Now equip your infinite launcher.  Pull out the knife and aim it at an enemy.  LET HIM HIT YOU! It's weird but it's the only way the glitch works. Now Leon should look like he is impaled with an infinite launcher.
